lead_paragraph: GROUPON DISMISSES CHIEF  |  Andrew Mason, the irreverent chief executive of Groupon, was ousted on Thursday, after the company’s dismal fourth-quarter results capped a string of disappointing quarters. True to his humorous style, Mr. Mason wrote in a letter to employees: “After four and a half intense and wonderful years as C.E.O. of Groupon, I’ve decided that I’d like to spend more time with my family. Just kidding — I was fired today. If you’re wondering why… you haven’t been paying attention.”
